org.xbill.DNS
Class Zone

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.NameSet
        |
        +--org.xbill.DNS.Zone
public class Zone
extends org.xbill.DNS.NameSet

A DNS Zone. This encapsulates all data related to a Zone, and provides convienient lookup methods.

          A primary zone

Constructor Detail

Zone

public Zone(String file,
            Cache cache)
     throws IOException
Creates a Zone from the records in the specified master file. All records that do not belong in the Zone are added to the specified Cache.
See Also:
Cache, Master

findRecords

public SetResponse findRecords(Name name,
                               short type)
Looks up Records in the Zone. This follows CNAMEs.
Parameters:
name - The name to look up
type - The type to look up
Returns:
A SetResponse object
See Also:
SetResponse

findExactMatch

public RRset findExactMatch(Name name,
                            short type)
Looks up Records in the zone, finding exact matches only.
Parameters:
name - The name to look up
type - The type to look up
Returns:
The matching RRset
